creator: Words Pictures Ltd
descriptionHtml:
It is not just another App.

This application is an independent part of a holistic system for the simultaneous study of English and Chinese languages ​​for children from 6 to 12 years old.

You can use it alone or in conjunction with our 100 themed paper-based coloring books, which include unique pictures, as well as words and hieroglyphs in English and Chinese.

With our application, your child will be able to learn how to write and pronounce over 1000 basic Chinese and English words and phrases.This will be an excellent basis for a deeper study of the language and will help to inspire your child for learning languages.

In addition to these benefits, learning Chinese contributes to development of musical ear, while calligraphy develops memory, perseverance and develops thinking in general.

The application divides players into teams based on their age and level of training and allows to achieve the best success by showing yourself in team play.

Children can communicate with each other using many colorful emojis and stickers, which they earn by getting stars for their progress in learning.
The absence of text chat makes the chat in our application completely safe for your child.

In the free version, 2 topics are available for you to study in Chinese and English in order to evaluate the application. After completing the free themes, you can subscribe for a month or a year to access all tasks and features of the Hobbedu app. Subscription automatically renews unless canceled before the end of the payment period. You can manage and cancel your subscription in your Google Play Store account.
descriptionShort: Study to wright and speak Chinese&English. Chat with your team around the World.

title: HobbEdu

container.value:
SAR Hong Kong (RPC), TST
Salisbury 3, Star House
Floor 7, office 747

creator: Words Pictures Ltd. Educational games for kids!
descriptionHtml:
Hobbedu is more than just a child-friendly educational game and flashcards app. This is a fun and free learning game for studying new languages, ​​for kids from 6 to 12 years old. With Hobbedu, you can easily learn new languages and make new friends while having a lot of fun.

We offer a unique and fun way to color in your world with our 100 themed coloring books. You can use it alone or in conjunction with Hobbedu learning apps. These books include unique pictures and words in English, Spanish and China, making them perfect for any activity!

With our application, your child will be able to learn how to write and pronounce over 1000 basic Chinese, Spanish and English words and phrases. This will be an excellent basis for a deeper study of the language and will help to inspire your child for learning languages.

Chinese learning has many benefits, including the development of musical ear and calligraphy skills. As well, learning Chinese can help you improve your thinking skills, as well as your perseverance.

The application divides players into teams based on their level of training and allows them to achieve the best success by showing yourself in team play. This system allows for a more cohesive and successful team effort.

Children can communicate with each other in a completely safe text chat, using many colorful emojis and stickers to earn progress in learning new languages. This helps keep communication fun and enjoyable, while providing a great way to learn more about others.

In this educational game, you can study the first lessons in Chinese, English, or Spanish for free, to evaluate the application. Complet free lessons and subscribing to access all tasks and features of the Hobbedu app.

If you looking a hobby educational games for kids, download Hobbedu and you help your child learn a new language in a fun and engaging way.
descriptionShort: Kids educational game to study write and speak Chinese, Spanish, and English

HONG KONG, KOWLOON

Rm 747 7/F Star House

title: HobbEdu: Kids Learn languages

container.value:
HONG KONG, KOWLOON
TSIM SHA TSUI, 3 Salisbury Rd
Rm 747 7/F Star House

creator: Words Pictures Ltd. Educational games for kids!
descriptionHtml:
Hobbedu is an innovative language learning app that offers a fun, colorful, and engaging way to learn a new language. The app includes flashcards and other interactive features to help users learn basic Chinese, Spanish, and English words and phrases. With Hobbedu, you can easily learn how to write and pronounce over 1000 words and phrases in these languages.

The app offers an educational game that makes learning languages enjoyable and motivating. Hobbedu uses a team-based system that divides players into teams based on their level of proficiency, allowing for a more cohesive and successful team effort. You can play with your friends, family members, or other users from all around the world, which can help you improve your language skills and make new friends.

Learning a new language can be challenging, but with Hobbedu, you can achieve your language goals in a fun and engaging way. The app is designed to help users learn basic vocabulary and grammar rules, which can be used as a foundation for deeper language study. Hobbedu provides an excellent way to inspire you to learn more and improve your thinking and memory skills.

Another great feature of Hobbedu is its team-based system, which allows users to show themselves in team play. This system encourages users to work together and helps to create a more cohesive and successful learning environment. The app also includes a text chat, where users can communicate with each other using many colorful emojis and stickers to track their progress in learning new languages.

Learning Chinese offers many benefits, including the development of a musical ear and calligraphy skills. The Chinese language is rich in history and culture, and learning it can be a fascinating and rewarding experience. With Hobbedu, you can learn basic Chinese words and phrases, which can help you build a solid foundation for studying this language further.

The app includes lessons in Spanish, English, and Chinese, which are designed to help users improve their language skills. You can study the first lessons in these languages for free to evaluate the application. If you like what you see, you can subscribe to access all tasks and features of the Hobbedu app.

Hobbedu is an excellent educational game that can help you achieve your language goals in a fun and engaging way. The app provides an innovative approach to language learning that combines traditional methods with modern technology. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced language learner, Hobbedu can help you learn a new language and inspire you to learn more.
descriptionShort: Educational game to study write and speak Chinese, Spanish, and English

title: HobbEdu: Learn languages

container.value:
HONG KONG, KOWLOON
TSIM SHA TSUI, 3 Salisbury Rd
Rm 747 7/F Star House

creator: Words Pictures Ltd. Educational games for kids!
descriptionHtml:
Learning new foreign languages with an app can be tiring. Have you ever thought about why? We think the main problem is that you need to constantly do the same thing over and over. Every time you go to a language learning app all you do will be just choosing correct words. Sometimes it’s just choosing, sometimes it’s putting in the right order or listening rather than choosing. For us it’s all choosing a word, like c’mon guys can get more fun experience browsing Google Play, do you even try? So, we are here to change it, we want to show that learning foreign languages can be fun or at least diverse. Hobbedu is our app developed to help you with learning English, Chinese and Spanish. We tried to make it both fun and educational.

We developed our Hobbedu app as an easier ways to learn different languages than just constantly grinding the same thing over and over again. When you start to study languages it often can become doom of your desire to have something in common with them. Mainly because parents want you to learn it and they don’t really care how it will happen. It will be bored by the process and it will be for language learning. That is why we addressed this problem and tried to make it more like a game with a learning process as a priority. Of course you cannot run away from exercises where you choose the correct word but they don’t need to be the most common ones. In our app we actively use flashcards to make the process more engaging. Exercises like reading and speaking are also included but we tried to regulate the amount so it wouldn’t be so pushy. Plenty of different exercises will prevent you from being bored. We chose not to use minimalistic design because it’s too dull.

With our app you can learn Spanish, English and Chinese and one of the best features is that you can do it in teams. Create or join a team so you can chat and compare your results or ask for some help with grammar. It’s always more interesting to do those kinds of studying activities in a group. For all languages we have pronunciation practices and for Chinese we have calligraphy because it is an important part of that language.

Don’t miss out on Hobbedu:

• The language learning app that keeps you interested in learning
• Learn English, Chinese and Spanish for free
• Big variety of exercises: grammar, pronunciation, reading, speaking, writing and calligraphy
• You can join a team to make studying process more fun
• Flashcards will make remembering words piece of cake
• Of course in team you will be able to chat with your new friends and share your progress

Download the Hobbedu app for free and conquer new languages with delight.
descriptionShort: Empower language skills easily through engaging lessons and creative activities.

appDetails.developerAddress:
HONG KONG, KOWLOON
TSIM SHA TSUI, 3 Salisbury Rd
Rm 747 7/F Star House
appDetails.developerName: Words Pictures Ltd. Educational games for kids!
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New update is ready! Improved performance and fixed bugs. Install the new version and don't forget to send your feedback.

HONG KONG, KOWLOON

creator: Words Pictures Ltd. Educational games for kids!
descriptionHtml:
Learning new foreign languages with an app can be tiring. Have you ever thought about why? We think the main problem is that you need to constantly do the same thing over and over. Every time you go to a language learning app all you do will be just choosing correct words. Sometimes it’s just choosing, sometimes it’s putting in the right order or listening rather than choosing. For us it’s all choosing a word, like c’mon guys can get more fun experience browsing Google Play, do you even try? So, we are here to change it, we want to show that learning foreign languages can be fun or at least diverse. Hobbedu is our app developed to help you with learning English, Chinese and Spanish. We tried to make it both fun and educational.

We developed our Hobbedu app as an easier ways to learn different languages than just constantly grinding the same thing over and over again. When you start to study languages it often can become doom of your desire to have something in common with them. Mainly because parents want you to learn it and they don’t really care how it will happen. It will be bored by the process and it will be for language learning. That is why we addressed this problem and tried to make it more like a game with a learning process as a priority. Of course you cannot run away from exercises where you choose the correct word but they don’t need to be the most common ones. In our app we actively use flashcards to make the process more engaging. Exercises like reading and speaking are also included but we tried to regulate the amount so it wouldn’t be so pushy. Plenty of different exercises will prevent you from being bored. We chose not to use minimalistic design because it’s too dull.

With our app you can learn Spanish, English and Chinese and one of the best features is that you can do it in teams. Create or join a team so you can chat and compare your results or ask for some help with grammar. It’s always more interesting to do those kinds of studying activities in a group. For all languages we have pronunciation practices and for Chinese we have calligraphy because it is an important part of that language.

Don’t miss out on Hobbedu:

• The language learning app that keeps you interested in learning
• Learn English, Chinese and Spanish for free
• Big variety of exercises: grammar, pronunciation, reading, speaking, writing and calligraphy
• You can join a team to make studying process more fun
• Flashcards will make remembering words piece of cake
• Of course in team you will be able to chat with your new friends and share your progress

Download the Hobbedu app for free and conquer new languages with delight.
